-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cestrc, c1))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 =(c1 ⋂ Ring))
⊣ c2 =(RingCat ` c1)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (c1 ⋂ Ring)⊆ c1
⊣ (w0 → c1 =(Base `(ExtStrCat ` c1)))

-| wceq(cfv(cestrc, c1), cfv(cestrc, c1))
